Package me.shivzee.util

Class JMailBuilder

java.lang.Object
me.shivzee.util.JMailBuilder
public class JMailBuilder extends Object
The JMailBuilder Class for Login/Signup Operations Check https://api.mail.tm for more info

      public static boolean create(String email, String password) throws LoginException
      (Synchronous) Creates a new Account (First Fetch the domain)
      Parameters:
      email - The email to create
      password - The password to set
      Returns:
      true if account was created
      Throws:
      LoginException - when account already exists, invalid inputs or network error

    • loginWithToken

      public static JMailTM loginWithToken(String token) throws LoginException
      Login into an account with token
      Parameters:
      token - the jwt token of the account
      Returns:
      the JMailTM instance to a jwt specifed account
      Throws:
      LoginException - when network error or token provided is invalid
